name: Sheep in Bullet Hell
description:
You are a sheep running around in a never ending world. Walk over the edge of any of the boarders of the screen and you get to a different part of the world.

A number of white globes are trying to hit you. Avoid them as much as possible.
There is a single smaller yellow globe. Try to catch it.

Game made for the jam https://itch.io/jam/pygamer-2021-jam
